name: Shoko
description:
A Jellyfin plugin to integrate [Jellyfin](https://jellyfin.org/docs/) with [Shoko Server](https://shokoanime.com/downloads/shoko-server/).
## Read this before installing
**This plugin requires that you have already set up and are using Shoko Server**, and that the files you intend to include in Jellyfin are **indexed** (and optionally managed) by Shoko Server. **Otherwise, the plugin won't be able to provide metadata for your files**, since there is no metadata to find for them.
overview: Manage your anime from Jellyfin using metadata from Shoko

versions.changelog:
fix: better handling of index number end

- Only add index number end for episodes if it's not the
  same as the episode number.

refactor: update signalr events

- Updated the SignalR Connection Manager
  to support both the new and old signalr events.
fix: prevent error being logged in the console on plugin settings page

Merge pull request #42 from fearnlj01/config-tweak

Add sortable checkboxes for description source
Misc: Implement requested style changes from #42

Fix: Ensure description sources sorting direction renders as expected

Fix: Settings description tweak

Misc: Migrations begone... Simpler for everyone this way!


Chore: Remove uneccersary using that snuck in somehow

Fix: Avoid requesting the config twice after load...

Refactor: Allows for a partially working settings migration

Fix: Change HTML description values to match Enum counterpart

Feat: Implements C# changes for new settings

Misc: minor refactoring

Feat: Add sortable checkboxes for description source
(Client side only, no settings saved

misc: order file list by series id.

fix: fix off-by-one error in GetAttributeValue

misc: add missing TODO and remove trailing spaces

refactor: move VFS location

- Moved the location of the VFS outside the plugins directory, so it
  won't be scanned on startup by Jellyfin when it tries to discover
  the plugins to load. Also, in case it wasn't obvious enough.
  THIS IS A BREAKIGN CHANGE. Okay? Okay.
